topics.body:
I can't really place it, I just think it looks kind of off.

Anyway, Marc just followed me.
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

topics.body:
So, awkward moment.
I went out the front door to get my shoes.
Then I went back inside to take my dog out.
I called for him, but he didn't come, until I looked out the front door and he came in.
Whoops.
